説明文: Benkenmitsu nikyōron (辨顕密二教論), also called simply Kenmitsu nikyōron (顕密二教論), Nikyōron(二教論). Treatise, written by Kūkai in roughly 813-15, outlining the character of the distinction between the teachings of esoteric and exoteric Buddhism.
